title: Explorer
description: Stay connected to my creative world!
features: Access to all public blog entries and general updates.
Join in open polls and art discussions.

title: Supporter
description: For those who love peeking behind the curtain!

title: Commissioner
description: Become a true part of my art journey.
features: Everything from the Supporter plan, plus:
One custom, personalized illustration per month (simple one color background, up to 2 characters).
Priority for custom commissions or special projects.
